CAREER OBJECTIVE
To acquire professional edge through hard work and continuous learing.Seeking an interactive and 
challenging environment for creativity and introduction of revolutionary ideas, where I can apply my 
strengths, interpersonal skills and an opportunity for personal growth and professional advancement in 
the field of accounts.
CAREER HIGHLIGHTS
Extremely well-organized and efficient. Quickly learn procedures and methods. Able to develop and 
implement new systems when necessary. Strong bookkeeping and managerial experience. Capable of 
handling projects concurrently. Excellent public relations and customer contact ability.
